name: Scrap Grannys - Online Multiplayer
description:
This game was made in one week for the Brackey's 2020 game jam with the theme holes.

Programming: Alex Hicks

Art: Calvin "BorroTheLeader"

OST: Adam Hicks & Matt Browne

Design Help: Calvin

Notes

The server is currently running on a free tier so if no one is playing is will shutdown down until the next player comes. During this time it will take a few seconds to spin up. If you join a lobby and no grannys are showing please relog the game.
